resources.string: Nodeflux Face Liveness
Lets\'s make sure nobody\'s impersonating you
Please take a selfie to help us confirm your liveness. We need you to perform a simple sequence of action within the defined time limit.
START
Terms and Conditions
Take a selfie
Please take a selfie to help us confirm your identity. Would not take more than a minute.
• Position your face in available face area\n• Make sure you have a good lightning\n• Hold your phone at eye level and look straight to the camera, then follow the instruction.
Your data is not be saved on our system.
VERIFY THE LIVENESS
Look over your left shoulder
Look over your Right shoulder
Blink your left eye
Blink your right eye
Finish
Start to repeat in 1.5 seconds
Blink your eyes
Smile and make sure your eyes open in 3 seconds
Smile and make sure your eyes open in 2 seconds
Smile and make sure your eyes open in 1 second
Face is not steady inside the oval, repeat in 3 seconds
Face is not steady inside the oval, repeat in 2 seconds
Face is not steady inside the oval, repeat in 1 second
Time is up, start again
Head is not steady, process failed
Hold steady
Tilt your head to the left
Tilt your head to the Right
Nod your head up
Nod your head down
Hold steady and Smile while blinking your eyes
Hold steady without smiling
Make sure your face straight to the oval and not covered
Bring your uncovered face closer to the oval and keep it center!
